titleStmt.title: One of the sermons preached at Westminster the fifth of Aprill, (being the day of the publike fast;) before the Right Honourable Lords of the High Court of Parliament, and set forth by their appointment. By the Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Davenant, John, ca. 1572-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Miller] for Richard Badger, and are to be sold by Iohn Stempe at his shop at the east end of S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: On Jeremiah III, 22. The other sermon was preached by Joseph Hall (STC 12692).
A variant of the edition without bookseller's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the east end of S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-street
